doc.after: Economically the southern Xiongnu relied almost totally on Han assistance Tensions were evident between the settled Chinese and practitioners of the nomadic way of life Thus in 94 Anguo Chanyu joined forces with newly subjugated Xiongnu from the north and started a large scale rebellion against the Han
